name: QueryRaycastWater

arguments.name: origin
arguments.desc: Raycast origin as world space vector

arguments.name: direction
arguments.desc: Unit length raycast direction as world space vector

arguments.name: maxDist
arguments.desc: Raycast maximum distance. Keep this as low as possible for good performance.

returns.name: hitPos
returns.desc: Hit point as world space vector

examples: --Raycast from a high point straight downwards, looking for water
description: This will perform a raycast query looking for water.
